game_description: 1972, Texas. One night, you had a car accident near the Stafford farm. You wanted to get help, so you went there. But it was your worst decision of your life. What after came...it was the real CURSED NIGHT for you. This horror VR game will show you the real fear. The house is free to be visited, while you have to solve puzzles, and the jumpscares are waiting for you. Play this VR horror experience if you are brave enough!

It got me twice though for someone who doesnâ€™t scare easily. I love puzzle games and I love horror games. Perfect! Enter if you dare. Not for the weak. ðŸ˜‚
review_3: A Great little horror game I'm impressed as made me jump etc quite a few times which will be the new "try this game out on my headset guys!" at the next house party .... Should create a good laugh watching them poo themselves..
review_4: Not bad, but it has some illogical puzzles, the menu can only be interacted with the right hand, the doors interactions could be improved. As a PC game it would be fine, but needs more polishing for VR controls.
review_5: Cursed night well it made me curse a few times so can only play when no kids about but I play seated and now I'm stuck as I can't pick 1 item up so will have to start again and play standing but dare I go back in the house if you're after the scariest game then this is it and at this price. Message for development I started game again this time standing I was too tall any chance you could add seated mode cause for some strange reason I want back in that house
